## Project Overview
Beautiful, interactive portfolio website for a recent female graduate with minimal work experience.

## Technical Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3 with animations and transitions
- Vanilla JavaScript for interactivity
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Design Guidelines
- Modern, clean aesthetic
- Professional color scheme with feminine touches
- Smooth scrolling and hover effects
- Interactive elements throughout
- Focus on education, skills, and potential rather than extensive work history

## Sections
- About Me
- Education
- Skills
- Projects
- Contact

## Development Status
✅ Project initialized
⏳ Building portfolio structure
